snippet: Roger Federer pulled out of the French Open on Thursday, ending his record streak of appearing in 65 consecutive Grand Slam tournaments — every one since the start of 2000....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer pulled out of the French Open on Thursday, ending his record streak of appearing in 65 consecutive Grand Slam tournaments — every one since the start of 2000.

headline.print_headline: Federer Out of French Open; 1st Slam He'll Miss Since 1999
headline.main: Federer Out of French Open; 1st Slam He'll Miss Since 1999
